segments.text: The boy on that stool is going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far up, and the stool is already wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this, it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t she see how dangerous this is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the floor is soaked—what a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop them before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s too busy with her dishes to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly, I just hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
